data.title: MC AC-001 Shining Victory
data.meta_description: The MC Shining Victory is a Atlesian Mobile Base and Supercarrier, and is one of the many airships and vessels in control of the Meiyo Clan. It is a powerful vessel, capable of acting as a floating fortress and carrying multiple squadrons of fighters. It is the pride of the Clan, being made by...
data.text:
“ The epitome of Warfare and mobile bases, and the greatest vessel we have to give. ”

— Official Meiyo Clan report

The MC Shining Victory is a Atlesian Mobile Base and Supercarrier, and is one of the many airships and vessels in control of the Meiyo Clan. It is a powerful vessel, capable of acting as a floating fortress and carrying multiple squadrons of fighters. It is the pride of the Clan, being made by themselves and with help from the Atlesian military for materials and shipyards. It is their main mode of transportation and acts as a Operations base and support vessel.

Design:[]

The ship itself is a built from scratch via some old drawings from War Thoughts Inc., remodeled to fit their needs, and it is a marvel to itself. With the main body of an Atlesian battlecruiser, it acts as the baseplate for the rest of it. With the additions of multiple hangars, a large cargo bay door in the rear of the vessel, and a large command bridge

Armaments:[]

The ship itself is a well armed powerhouse, with multiple broadside cannon batteries, missile batteries for both air combat and ground bombardment.

Its main weapon is its forward mounted Railgun, able to fire 800mm shells at a ridiculous 4,500 mph. speed, and has been known to pierce even the heaviest of Grimm and Airship armor. The railgun itself has been copied to create a large anti-airship network, created after the Battle of Beacon showed Atlas that they need Airship defense.

Defenses:[]

Its main defense is its point defense systems, including interceptor missiles, smoke deployment, flares, and a powerful shield system.

Trivia:[]
